Price: $47.99 - $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:39:52 UTC – Details)


TOSY 36 and 360 LEDs Frisbee – Extremely Bright Flying Disc, Smart Modes, Glow in The Dark, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, 175g, Perfect Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teenagers
36 SUPER BRIGHT LEDs – 100x brighter than any other light-up discs! Our black plastic disc looks super cool, while the white plastic disc gives you more visibility at night when you throw it outdoor.
SMART MODES & MOTION SENSORS – Easily select the Brightness level and Timer mode you want. LEDs light turns on and off automatically for battery-saving.
RECHARGEABLE – 30-minute charge that lasts up to a thousand throws or a full Ultimate match of 90 minutes. Package includes 1x USB Type C to C cable (charger not included).
175 GRAMS – Our disc meets the Professional Ultimate Frisbee standards for long, straight, precise flights and highly comfortable grip. It is great for freestyle tricks too!
UPGRADE YOUR GAME – Spice up your Christmas shopping list and favorite Frisbee bottle and tossing games (Beersbee, Polish Horseshoes or others) with our highly durable, waterproof and premium discs!

Read more

Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)


The UNO matching card game everyone loves goes to a galaxy far, far away with this special Star Wars edition. Featuring both classic and newer characters spanning the movies of the beloved Skywalker Saga, it also includes “The Force” wild card unique to this deck. Players aim to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the discard pile. When players are down to one card, they must prove that the Force is with them by shouting “UNO!” This edition of the family-favorite card game makes a great gift for players 7 years and older, especially Star Wars fans. Colors and decorations may vary.
It’s the classic UNO card game everyone loves, now pitting the forces of the Light Side and the Dark Side against each other! Perfect for Younglings and Master Jedi alike, ages 7 years and older.
Each card is decorated with an iconic image from the Star Wars franchise, including classic characters from the original trilogy, the prequels and the sequels -a great collector’s edition!
Just like in the classic UNO game, players match cards by color or number in a race to empty their hand.
Includes an exclusive wild “The Force” card. Play it, choosing another player and a color. If that player has at least one card of that color, they are forced to draw 2 cards. If they don’t, play just continues with the chosen color.
UNO Star Wars makes a great gift for Star Wars fans of all ages.

5
Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)

(4C/4T, 4M Cache) It runs much faster than i3-5005u, N3450, j3455, j4125, j4105 etc. chips. Loaded With 8gb DDR4 Ram, 256gb SSD, creates a very smooth experience for your visually ... Read more

【High-Performance Processor】Beelink MINI S built-in faster 11 generation Intel Jasper Lake Processor N5095 base frequency 2.0GHz, up to 2.9 GHz. (4C/4T, 4M Cache) It runs much faster than i3-5005u, N3450, j3455, j4125, j4105 etc. chips. Loaded With 8gb DDR4 Ram, 256gb SSD, creates a very smooth experience for your visually home entertainment, streaming video, Web browsing, work, and games.
【Storage Expansion Options】The MINI S Mini Computer built-in 8 GB DDR4, 256GB M.2 SSD (M.2 is much better than mSATA/HDD in terms of both smaller size and higher transfer performance) and supports up to 2TB of 2.5-inch SATA HDD / SSD.
【Support 4K Dual Screen Display】The Mini Computer equipped with Intel UHD Graphics to support support 4K FPS video playback, which brings you first-class viewing .Dual HDMI allows you to connect two displays at the same time,thereby reducing waiting time and improving your work efficiency.
【Efficient Heat Dissipation & WIFI5】Beelink Mini Pc comes with quite large fan and heat sink which can keep the Mini Pc cool and allow the heat to be perfectly dissipated.Built in WIFI 5 (802.11 b/g/n/ac), Bluetooth 4.0.
【Auto Power On & Beelink Technical Support】If you want to auto power on, please send us the barcode at the bottom of the machine first, and we will send the corresponding tutorial file. All our products have obtained FCC, CE ROSH certification. We provide 1 year 7 days / 24 hours service and lifetime help with technical issues, no need to worry about quality issues, just email our customer service team.

EXCITING THIRD EDITION: This edition of the Betrayal at the House on the Hill game is rich with horror-based content, gaming elements, and characters not seen in previous versions
HAUNTED HOUSE TRAITOR GAME: Players must work together to survive the nightmare…but beware . The house turns one player against the others in this cooperative strategy game
GREAT FOR NEW PLAYERS: This 3rd Edition of the game features artwork, rule books, trackers, and cards that will help new players navigate the game and jump right in
MODULAR BOARD PIECES: The Betrayal at House on the Hill tabletop game features 50 blood-curdling scenarios. Each trip to the house promises fresh horrors and a new story is created every time you play
MINIATURES BOARD GAME: The game includes 6 finely detailed character figures, each with a removable colored disc, and features 12 diverse characters not seen in previous editions

CHOMPING DINOS: It’s a fun twist on Hungry Hungry Hippos, the classic marble chomping game. This Dino Edition of Hungry Hungry Hippos features 4 adorable (and hungry) dinosaurs
READY, SET, CHOMP: Kids can enjoy lots of laughs as they watch their dino chomp down the plastic marbles. Whoever’s dino chomps the most marbles wins
PLAY A BONUS GAME: Try a game in which players still have their dino chomp on the marbles, but everyone tries to gobble down the pink one. Whoever’s dino chomps that pink marble wins the game
FUN KIDS’ GAME: Hungry Hungry Hippos Dino Edition preschool game is a great choice for your child’s playdate and it makes a fun birthday gift for kids ages 4 and up

Material Type: Aluminum alloy

ZAYAD Reacher grabber USES the premium aluminum alloy materials, you can pick up 3 pounds, don’t worry about
grabber could break,it has a very comfortable handle and a rubber chuck, You can pick up small
objects in red wine glasses and crevices.

After surgery patients or elderly, act not convenient, don’t need to bend over you can pickup
the garbage in the garden, protection from already of lumbar spine, for children, it does
not need to stand on a table or on the steps, you can easily get high objects.

Use it for:
Picking up trash and litter.
Picking up broken glass pieces.
Reaching under furniture and beds.
Retrieving items in hard to reach cabinets.
Picking up daily things such as the newspaper.
Plus many many more uses.

How to Use
1. The arrow on the plastic part of the folding place is aimed at the groove on the aluminum alloy pole.
2. The aluminum alloy chuck is inserted into the hole in the plastic part.
3. Pull the handle switch, clamp the head to close, loosen the switch, clip the head to loosen.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:24:24 UTC – Details)


The Taboo game is the game of unspeakable fun! Who can get their teammates to say “Brain Freeze” without being able to say Ice Cream, Headache, Eating, Cold or Fast? When playing the Taboo game, the obvious clues are strictly forbidden. Players race against the timer as they try to give creative and carefully-worded clues to get team players to guess words fast. But don’t mention unmentionables, or it’s time for the squeaker, which means losing the point. Players can also play using the Game-changer die to mix things up. If it lands on One Guesser, only one teammate can guess on their turn. With 4 other possibilities on the die, players better be shrewd, quick-thinking, and willing to take some risks – but don’t get shut down by the squeaker! Enjoy classic Taboo gameplay for game night with the family and with friends.
FORBIDDEN WORDS: It’s classic Taboo gameplay as players get teammates to say the Guess word without saying the forbidden words on the cards
INCLUDES SQUEAKER: Oops! Say a forbidden word and get the squeaker in this super-fun guessing game for families and kids over 13 years of age
LOTS OF GUESS WORDS: The Taboo game is a great party game to play when friends are together! It includes 260 cards with over 640 Guess words
GAME-CHANGER DIE: Game-changer die lets players change up the game. Get ready to be quick-thinking, take some risks, and have lots of laughs
RACE AGAINST THE TIMERS: The suspense builds as players race against the timer in this fun and fast-paced party game


Read more


Taboo Board Game, Guessing Game For Families and Kids Ages 13 and Up, 4 or More Players

The Taboo game is the game of unspeakable fun! Who can get their teammates to say “Brain Freeze” without being able to say Ice Cream, Headache, Eating, Cold or Fast? When playing the Taboo game, the obvious clues are strictly forbidden. Players race against the timer as they try to give creative and carefully-worded clues to get team players to guess words fast. But don’t mention unmentionables, or it’s time for the squeaker, which means losing the point. Players can also play using the Game-changer die to mix things up. If it lands on One Guesser, only one teammate can guess on their turn. With 4 other possibilities on the die, players better be shrewd, quick-thinking, and willing to take some risks – but don’t get shut down by the squeaker! Enjoy classic Taboo gameplay for game night with the family and with friends.

ELECTRONIC GAME UNIT: Try to beat the highest score. The game unit features lights, sounds, and keeps a record of the highest score. It’ll announce the high score the next time the game is turned on
5 MODES OF PLAY: Players can challenge their friends or sharpen their own skills with 5 different exciting modes of play
EXCITING, ACTIVE GAME: The Bulls-Eye Ball electronic game is small enough to pack up and take to parties. Challenge family members at your next game night
INDOOR GAME: This active indoor game for 1 or more players makes a great holiday gift of birthday gift for kids ages 8 and up

Price: $21.99 - $9.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:08 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $84.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:05:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

CORDLESS & EASY-TO-STORE:  No external power supply is needed, VacLife portable air compressor with a rechargeable battery pack can help you inflate most inflatables anytime and anywhere. With its lightweight and compact size of 6.3*2.5*2.4inch, you can simply store this cordless air compressor in your backpack, pocket, and car center console and take it out for use anytime. Help yourself from now on, saving the trouble of going to the gas station to inflate your tires.
FAST INFLATING & NON-STOP WORKING: VacLife mini air compressor is perfect for daily needs or emergencies. This powerful tire pump is embedded with a high-efficiency motor providing an airflow of 30L/Min. It only takes 30s to inflate a mountain bike(0-36psi) and 1min to inflate a 205/55 R16 car tire (29-36psi). Moreover, with the turbofan providing good heat dissipation, this tire pump can work continuously without pause. Also, the upgraded air hose is more heat-resistant and easy to handle.
LARGE-CAPACITY & LONG-LASTING: VacLife cordless tire inflator is powered by three large-capacity batteries of 2,500mAh that can work continuously for up to 25mins. Once fully charged in 3-4 hours, this portable tire pump can inflate 6 car tires (205/55/R16) from 29 to 36psi. In addition, with multiple accessories, it is suitable for different inflatables, such as the tire of cars, motorcycles, bicycles, and balls. It is a great helper for you on the road.
4+N SMART MODES: VacLife portable air pump for car tires is convenient to use with 4+N smart modes, easily meeting your various inflating needs! (Please note that it is suitable for car tires with width ≤ 245mm and pressure ≤ 50psi.) The 4 preset modes are car mode, motorcycle mode, bike mode, and ball mode, which facilitate the operation of the new beginners. Moreover, the manual mode enables you to set the desired pressure from 2-160psi according to different inflatables.
LED DIGITAL DISPLAY & AUTO SHUTOFF: This tire inflator with portable design comes with a precise pressure gauge and a large LED digital display, enabling you to read the real-time pressure and the preset pressure at just a glance. You can also rest assured with the auto shutoff design. This car air pump will stop automatically once reached the preset pressure. No more over-inflating, it’s simple and safe.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $138.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:00:15 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Small size–saving space

Small dimension (106 x 106 x 18 mm) and light weight (232g) make the mini pc more convenient to carry outside. You can also hang it behind the monitor, which greatly saves your space.

4K Dual display

Beelink T4 Pro can give you wonderful visual enjoyment thanks to the built-in HD Graphic 500. You can smoothly enjoy the 4K videos. Meanwhile, you can connect 2 displays at the same time with 2 HDMI ports, which greatly saves your time.

CPU: Apollo Lake Processor N3350

Beelink T4 Pro Mini PC is equipped with N3350 Processor (2M Cache, 1.10GHz up to 2.40GHz) and pre-installed with Win 10. The powerful hardware gives you a stable Internet environment.

Storage

Built-in 4GB LPDDR3 RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM, the mini computer has enough storage space for you to deal with daily work, watch videos, browse the Internet, home entertainment, etc. Fully meets your daily needs.

Dual WiFi and Bluetooth

T4 Pro Mini PC provides 2.4G + 5.8G dual WiFi, Gigabit Ethernet and Bluetooth 4.0. You can enjoy stable wireless connection and high transfer speed.

Heat sink and fan

The powerful heat dissipation function (built-in heat sink and quiet fan) enables the mini desktop computer to cool down in time, improving the operating efficiency.

Interface: 1 x DC in port, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x LAN port, 2 x HDMI ports, 1x Audio Jack (HP&MIC)Packages: 1 x T4 Pro Mini PC, 1 x HDMI Cable (100cm), 1 x Power Adapter 12V/1.5-2A, 1 x User Manual

[N3350 Processor] Beelink T4 Pro mini pc has installed with Win 10 Apollo Lake Processor N3350 which has 2M Cache, 1.1GHz up to 2.4GHz. It provides a stable environment for work and entertainment.
[4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM] Loaded with 4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM, the mini computer could offer you enough memory storage to meet your daily needs such as entertainment, video, web browsing, and work.
[Dual HDMI] With 2 HDMI ports, the mini pc can easily connects 2 monitors at the same time. Meanwhile, it comes with HD Graphics 500 so you can enjoy the web surfing, home theater, game and so on with your family members.
[Dual WiFi and Bluetooth] The mini pc provides 2.4G + 5.8G dual WiFi and Gigabit Ethernet. It means that you can transfer and download data at a high speed. Besides, you are available to connect with many devices which support Bluetooth connection because of the built-in Bluetooth 4.0.
[Ultra-thin Stylish Design] Thanks to the ultra thin design (106 x 106 x 18 mm and light weight of 232g), this mini pc can be hang behind the monitor and even carried on the journey, which can greatly save your space. Besides, it has the fan and heat sink to cool down the pc and make the cpu and hard drive work normal.
